DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study investigate influence mild , moderate severe renal impairment pharmacokinetics safety BI 201335 comparison control group normal renal function single dose BI 201335 .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Safety BI 201335 Patients With Mild Severe Renal Impairment
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Male female healthy subject normal renal function subject impair renal function relatively good health Exclusion criterion : Any relevant deviation healthy condition healthy volunteer significant disease renal impairment renal impaired subject
